00059 //****************************************************
00060 //This Set the Image ,and show it
00061 //
00062 //****************************************************
00063 void hdassImageDetial::slotSetImage(KURL url)
00064 {
00065 
00066    currentImage=QPixmap(url.path());
00067    int width ,height;
00068    width=currentImage.width();
00069    height=currentImage.height();
00070    QPixmap draw(QSize(750,330));
00071    QPainter p(&draw);
00072 
00073    p.fillRect(0,0,750,330,Qt::black);
00074    if(width<600&&height<330)
00075    {
00076        //DAVID draw image at center
00077        p.drawPixmap((375-width/2),(165-height/2),currentImage);
00078    }
00079 
00080    else
00081    {
00082         if(11*width>20*height)
00083         {
00084                 int newheight=(600*height/width);
00085                 QImage rescale=currentImage.convertToImage().scale(600,newheight);
00086                 p.drawImage(75,165-newheight/2,rescale);
00087                 
00088         }
00089         else
00090         {
00091                 int newwidth=(330*width/height);
00092                 QImage rescale=currentImage.convertToImage().scale(newwidth,330);
00093                 p.drawImage((375-newwidth/2),0,rescale);
00094         }
00095    }    
00096    p.end();
00097    setBackgroundPixmap(draw);
00098 }
